title: Milton Friedman’s 1999 Vision: Predicting Bitcoin Before the Digital Age Dawned
description: Nearly two decades before the Bitcoin network revolutionized the digital world, Nobel Laureate Milton Friedman foresaw the emergence of digital currencies.
